TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: I must admit that this discovery is rather embarrassing, but apparently I had previously mistaken the Dree adjective modifiers for â€œhostileâ€? and â€œneutralâ€?.
AZOLLA: Interesting, what led to that error?

SENNETTI: In our discussions, Ditylum kept using a particular adjective while referring to the anglerfish in the <color=orange>Bright Node</color>. I had previously assumed this to be an adjective roughly translating to â€œaggressive,â€? but it apparently means â€œneutralâ€? or â€œtame.â€?
AZOLLA: Peculiar. Would this imply that the anglerfish in that area actually arenâ€™t hostile?
SENNETTI: It may, although I would suggest giving me more time to properly decipher this fact, as the consequences for me being incorrect again are a potential catastrophe.
NESIA: Donâ€™t fret, Sennetti, it happens to the best of us.
